text: Hinokhalha thoko opochera ishaani olhupalhe akina aathananiya ukumiha isadaka kila nihuku, anochokholha ukumiha isadaka cho milhatu chaya ashinene ni umalhihera wo uwonya wa attu akina. Yesu khanopanga chiicho ukhalhawaya ahomalhiha veekuminhe awe mwanene isadaka wa attu onkhaye nkwaha mmoka ithoshaka wo ikatema choothe.
